Text:
Thank you very much. I have installed it and it is functioning perfectly.

Multumesc mult. L-am instalat si functioneaza perfect.

Thank you so much for this. It works perfectly. To the person who mentioned a virus. McAfee did find a Virus in the Keygen for me too, but I think you'll find that is just the crack. Also to the original seeder, I have tried to reseed but now that McAfee has found and quaranteened that keygen file uTorrent is now saying files missing. How do I reseed for you now?? Thanks again.

@cshermen2000

Just go to quaranteened list and right click on it and choose 'restore and exclude from scan'. The files will be restored to original folder. You can seed!
